parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Pilot Camera </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the target of the object airplane or helicopter [[A3_Targeting_config_reference#class_pilotCamera|pilotCamera]] tracking. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getPilotCameraTarget''' object </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [isTracking, targetPosition, targetObject]; returns [false,[0,0,0],<NULL-object>] if camera is not in a tracking mode or if object has no [[A3_Targeting_config_reference#class_pilotCamera|pilotCamera]]. 
* isTracking: [[Boolean]] - returns whether the camera is in a tracking mode
* targetPosition: [[Array]] - format [[PositionASL]], returns the position of the tracked area or object
* targetObject: [[Object]] - returns the tracked object, [[objNull]] if camera is only tracking an area
</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_pilotCamTrack = ('''getPilotCameraTarget''' [[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[select]] 0;
_pilotCamTargetPos = ('''getPilotCameraTarget''' [[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[select]] 1;
_pilotCamTarget = ('''getPilotCameraTarget''' [[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[select]] 2;
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[hasPilotCamera]], [[getPilotCameraPosition]], [[getPilotCameraDirection]], [[getPilotCameraRotation]], [[setPilotCameraDirection]], [[setPilotCameraRotation]], [[setPilotCameraTarget]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
